item.title: jekyll
item.description:
I stumbled upon Jekyll and it seemed pretty cool. I always found wordpress kind of intimidating.

It’s kind of hectic at first but after a bit of tinkering this was born.

I guess it’s one of those things where your site’s going to evolve over time.

Right now I’m pretty satisfied.

item.title: sorta finished a node.js game
item.description:
So I decided to play around with node.js and ended up making a isketch clone. Someone showed me isketch when I was a teen and I thought it was a really fun game but I cant even play the game anymore because it requires shockwave so I decided to make a HTML5 version.

So far its been really fun and people seem to enjoy it.

You can check it out [here]

Source code is in my github, enjoy.
